channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Bitcoin / AltCoin Payment Gateway for WooCommerce & Multivendor store / shop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Bitcoin / AltCoin Payment Gateway for WooCommerce & Multivendor store / shop

item.title: CVE-2022-4118|2024-08-03T01:27:54.447Z -- unknown -- bitcoin%20%2F%20altcoin%20payment%20gateway%20for%20woocommerce%20%26%20multivendor%20store%20%2F%20shop
item.description: The Bitcoin / AltCoin Payment Gateway for WooCommerce & Multivendor store / shop WordPress plugin through 1.7.1 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by authenticated users
